main_text:
Indefinite, Definite, and Bare Singular Generics
3. Indefinite, Definite, and Bare Singular Generics

The above discussion was primarily centered on accounts of bare plural
generics, which have received the most discussion in the literature.
Singular generics introduce their own sets of complications.
section_title: 3. Indefinite, Definite, and Bare Singular Generics
